question.title: How could I to create ALIAS on @NamedQuery?
question.body:
I am trying to create a @NamedQuery that use COUNT and ALIAS(AS) to retrieve informations from a SELECT. The problem is I don't know how could I to create an ALIAS using @NamedQuery. I was looking for examples but I cannot find any of how to do. Without using the ALIAS it works but I need this because I want to use the ORDER BY for it.

Trying

public class MyEntity {
    @NamedQueries({
            @NamedQuery(name = MyEntity.FIND_TENDENCIA, query = "SELECT NEW com.dto.MyEntityDTO(ns.numero, COUNT(ns.numero) AS qtd_total_sort) "
                                                                        + "FROM MyEntity ns "
                                                                        + "WHERE ns.name = :nome_loteria "
                                                                        + "GROUP BY ns.numero "
                                                                        + "ORDER BY qtd_total_sort"),
    @Id
    private int id;
    private int numero;
    
    //getter setters
}

public class MyEntityDTO {
    private int numero;
    private long qtd_total;
    
    public MyEntityDTO(int numero, long qtd_total){
            this.numero = numero;
            this.qtd_total = qtd_total;
    }
    
    //getter setters
}

//DAO
public List<MyEntityDTO> getTendenciaNumerosSorteados(String nomeLoteria){
        TypedQuery<MyEntityDTO> query = getSession().createNamedQuery(MyEntity.FIND_TENDENCIA, MyEntityDTO.class);
        query.setParameter("nome_loteria", nomeLoteria);
        return query.getResultList();
    }
